english.segment1: Come let us worship and bow down. And kneel before the Lord, our Maker. Come let us worship and bow down. And kneel before the Lord, our Maker
english.segment2: He is our God. He is our God. We are the people of His pasture. He is our God. He is our God. We are the sheep of His hand
english.segment3: Worship the Lord in holiness. Let the whole earth stand in awe. He will come to judge the world. In righteousness and truth
